english.segment1: I am too tired of running. Would you still take me though. I keep falling To hear you say. I have been waiting. And to know your love it is never ending
english.segment2: I long to see you again. Holy Spirit please come back in
english.segment3: I could never walk alone. All this time I never gave to you. You're all I have you're all I know. And I am calling on you now
english.segment4: I give you my life won't you take me. For I was nothing before you found me. I will use my voice to sing out. With all that I am, with all that I have
english.segment5: I long to see you again. Holy Spirit please come back in
english.segment6: I could never walk alone. All this time I never gave to you. You're all I have you're all I know. And I am calling on you now
english.segment7: How many times will I deny you. Still your love won't let me go. How many times will I deny you. Still your love won't let me go
english.segment8: I long to see you again
english.segment9: I could never walk alone. All this time I never gave to you. You're all I have you're all I know. And I am calling on you now. I'm calling on you now, I'm calling on you now, I'm calling on you now
